caption: A group of people gathered at a particular location, led by an elderly figure with a younger individual beneath him. The younger person said something to the elder, but the old man appeared displeased, cautioning the youth. They then huddled together to discuss something.Behind them stretched a forest, suggesting they were in the midst of it. A fire blazed in their midst, likely for warmth. Afterward, they seemed to be planning to depart. They used the fire to set the surroundings ablaze and took some ignited wood as torches before leaving the area.
